comment: Ngl I'm only 2 weeks in the class and hate her no shade. I wish i would've never took her for this class.

Tests are 75% of the grade and the average was always an F with no curve. She seems like a nice person outside of the class, but even tho she says it's not memorization, it really is. I did everything I could think of to pass and still couldn't. It was harder than orgo.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. the test are not what you expect and she does not give extra credit. attendance is mandatory and there are in-class assignments for a grade. sadly there is no curve :((

very nice prof and passionate about teaching cell bio but her tests are IMPOSSIBLE to pass, and she wants you to challenge yourself to go much deeper into the material. It's also the fact that the class pace was only 50 mins and I definitely had to rush through the tests. The test averages has been an F so far and there are no curves.
